content: HSL4-G Heavy-duty wedge anchor Ultimate-performance heavy-duty expansion stud anchor with approvals for safety-relevant applications in concrete (carbon steel, external thread) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features High tensile and shear load capacity Force-controlled expansion allows follow-up expansion ETA Option 1 for cracked and uncracked concrete ICC-ES/AC 193 for cracked and uncracked concrete and seismic Suitable for dynamic loading including fatigue, seismic and shock Applications Heavy-duty fastenings in highly safety-relevant or dynamic applications, including applications in nuclear power plants Applications where extensive approval back-up or technical back-up is required, e.g. machines, heavy equipment, steel columns, heavy pipe supports, pumps, beam supports, medical equipment, cantilevers, cranes, car hoists, etc. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated, Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) Head configuration: Externally threaded Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated, Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) | Head configuration | Externally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | Installation tools | SIW 6AT-A22 Cordless impact wrench | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2237456 -
